So yeah pretty usual setting. Father-in-law lives with the married couple and just mooches of the son while sexually harassing the daugther-in-law get's told of. Somehow manages to find a video of her getting gangbanged/raped by a group of ppl in college. Threatens to show his son, but you know he still want's their way of life to continue so he never planned on tellin the son BUT!!! She has to sleep with him to keep him quiet anyway or he will show the video to his son. Goes on to sleep with her and she pretty much falls for his cock instantly and then he keeps forcing her to sleep with her. Then last page has the son telling her he will have to go on a buisness trip so he will be away and the dad is standing outside smiling at this while the wife is thinking what will happen? Thats the end, so probably if he makes a sequel we'll see how she falls even further and probably becomes pregnant with the dads child.
